snippet.title: trailer sample gunpowder
snippet.description:
Some kinds of combinations are legendary, and in this game, it will be essential to know this (pretty familiar) kind of combination Gunpowder.
A Puzzle game based on a Gunpowder mix, crafting ammo, unlocking items, and something more in the background.

A sample gunpowder crafting system is the way, but the reason why you doing that in this DAM factory, well, this just happened on an Ordinary Day, in September

The Digital off, the Sun Set, and the people back to the time.

Coming Soon.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3005310/Sample_Gunpowder/
